name: Tenchi Muyou! Toukou Muyou: No Need for School
overview: Tenchi Muyou! Toukou Muyou is a Japanese-style adventure game based on the Tenchi Muyo anime series. The story centers around Tenchi's school life; while school is generally Tenchi's respite from his bizarre home life filled with beautiful ladies from other planets, one day Ryoko decides she wants to start attending Tenchi's school to try to get closer to him, and of course all the other ladies wind up there as well. The game plays out in standard visual novel style, with extended voiced story scenes occasionally punctuated by dialogue choices that affect how the following scene plays out.
